actions.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Blumenauer to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Blumenauer to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to increase the number of states eligible for funding through the nonmotorized National Priority Safety Program and to double the funding for that program.
purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to increase the number of states eligible for funding through the nonmotorized National Priority Safety Program, and double the funding for that program.
